Just a few sidenotes:

1. Even if you are ignoring other people's posts, you're still 
responsible for them, and can't just ignore them out of the RPG 
without moding. Missing posts is understandable, though, and happens 
often, so calm down.
2. Liono actually flew off a little while before Shadow Cat walked up 
to him (I think). He definetly didn't teleport (or I'd be giving him 
a big lecture).
3. If you really wanna insult Ryo, do it over private email. Swearing 
(not that I consider 'prick' swearing, but some people do) is 
annoying enough IC, and its even more annoying OOC.

(If you really wanna reply to this, please do it over private email. 
There's no point in taking up RP space with arguments.)

Sorry to everyone else who's time this wastes. Just needed to get a 
few things straight.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Alten Gould" <beastwarsaddress@h...> 
wrote:
